name: Manlandia
startIntroPart1: Welcome to Manlandia, the place where men can be dudes, dude. Imagine a world free of bullcrap modern feminist corruption, where men can provide for their families and be served by their state-provided girlfriends...
startIntroPart2: But in order to achieve this, we must destroy the beta males who still plague this land. FOR MANLANDIA!
declaringWar: You're the ball, dude, and we finna kick you so hard, man.
defeated: Perhaps we are failures after all.
introduction: Ayo, mah man! Wassup! Real baller country you got there, dude.
hateHello: What you here for, ugly beta cuck?
declaringFriendship: You're actually a pretty cood dude, dude.
tradeRequest: Hey kid! You want some uh' dat good stuff?
uniques: [+33]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]

name: Wejaboz
declaringWar: Daddy will steal all of your kittens!!!
attacked: how dare you invade my server!!!
introduction: Welcome to Wejaboz forum, we like to chat about anime and share pictures of our body pillow cllections.
denounced: how dare you!!!! At least she was 16, im not some kind of creep!
declaringFriendship: hey kitten, will you let daddy into your DMs now? pretty please?
tradeRequest: h-hi there. w-would you like to trade, Ambassador-sama?
uniques: [-3 Culture, -3 Science] [in all cities] <when below [0] [Power]> <before discovering [Computers]>

name: Agarthaniz
declaringWar: You will bend to the will of Shambhala! Exterminate! Exterminate!
attacked: You will bend to the will of Shambhala! Exterminate! Exterminate!
defeated: How could we be defeated by our inferiors
introduction: Greetings, inferior beings. We are the people of Agartha, the kings of Shambhala, we will not rest until the earth is ours again.
hateHello: How have you not collapsed yet?
denounced: You dare deny the might of Shambhala???!!!!!!!
declaringFriendship: Pehaps you are not so inferior to us, there may be room for you yet in Shambhala.
tradeRequest: You are going to trade with us, and you are going to like it.
uniques: [-50]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]

name: Nuhamshahr
introduction: Greetings, fellow leader. Witness the glory of Nuhamshahr.
denounced: If we have our way, there will be no more libelous dribble from your mouth.
